At The Ohioan Hotel & Event Center, we provide everything you need to execute a successful and engaging event. Our meeting spaces are equipped with advanced A/V technology available for rent, complemented by a full suite of amenities designed to support impactful presentations, collaborative workshops, and seamless communication. 


Whether you're planning a strategic summit, training session, or team-building retreat, our expert staff and state-of-the-art resources ensure your event runs smoothly from start to finish.

  • On-site technology support specialist
  • State-of-the-art, integrated technology
  • Touch screen controls
  • Data projectors
  • Plasma screens
